meanings.definition: To fail to function properly or as expected.
meanings.sent1: The old car kept misfunctioning during the road trip.
meanings.sent2: The computer misfunctioning caused delays in the project.
meanings.sent3: The misfunctioning toaster made breakfast time quite an adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her misfunctioning phone was like a silent friend suddenly going mute.
meanings.sent5: The misfunctioning engine roared sporadically, disrupting the peaceful night.

meanings.definition: The state of not working correctly or as intended.
meanings.sent1: The constant misfunctioning of the printer frustrated the office staff.
meanings.sent2: The misfunctioning of the air conditioner made the room uncomfortably warm.
meanings.sent3: The misfunctioning of the clock led to some comical misunderstandings.
meanings.sent4: The misfunctioning of the traffic lights caused chaos on the streets.
meanings.sent5: The misfunctioning of the elevator left everyone stranded on different floors.
